name: Robert Bush
description: For a while, there weren't many other SUVs in this tweener segment, with most rivals being either smaller or larger than the Compass. Not so anymore.

name: Jhon Smith
description: Not so anymore. Rivals like the Chevrolet Trailblazer, Mazda CX-30 and Volkswagen Taos are some of Edmunds' favorites, offering lots of features and space for the price.

name: Barnaly Kas
description: All come with a 2.4-liter four-cylinder engine (177 horsepower, 172 lb-ft of torque), though we expect new powertrains are on the way. .

name: Laly Wilson
description: This warranty begins when the manufacturerâ€™s warranty expires. And for a year, you can use the Roadside Assistance Service for free .
